testcase.name: Sign in to the website using a username and password
testcase.system-out: Given user is on the home page of the application...........................passed And user clicks sign-in link from the top right of the application..........passed And user enters "everythingIsPerfect@evrythng.com", "12345" in related field.passed And user clicks sign-in button..............................................passed Then user logs in successfully..............................................passed
